inputFields.name: folderId
inputFields.description: if not supplied one will be generated for you

fields.name: artworkPermissions
fields.description: Will not work in subscriptions for now

fields.name: created
fields.description: timestamp

inputFields.name: categoryId
inputFields.description: Will use default if not provided

inputFields.name: artworkId
inputFields.description: Will be generated if not provided

inputFields.name: artworkName
inputFields.description: Will use the filename if not provided

types.name: Category
types.description: The artwork category specified by the organisation

fields.name: number
fields.description: Serial number of correction (begins with 1 and increases from oldest corrections to newest)

inputFields.name: shareId
inputFields.description: will be generated if not provided

inputFields.name: brandId
inputFields.description: if brand is known. Overrides brandName

inputFields.name: brandName
inputFields.description: matches existing brand names or creates a new brand. Overridden by brandId

inputFields.name: categoryNames
inputFields.description: matchies existing category names or creates the path. Overridden by categoryId

types.name: CreateArtworkInput
types.description: Input for creating a project artwork

inputFields.name: projectId
inputFields.description: Will be generated if not supplied

inputFields.name: shareId
inputFields.description: will be generated if not provided

fields.name: id
fields.description: Temporary id used for mapping to tree. Do not save

types.name: File
types.description: The file representaion in the system.

fields.name: created
fields.description: timestamp

fields.name: invoicePdf
fields.description: slower query. Request on demand

fields.name: organisationMemberships
fields.description: List of organisations that the current user is a member of

fields.name: currentOrganisation
fields.description: Currently selected organisation

fields.name: impersonatedBy
fields.description: set to impersonating users username if impersonated

fields.name: organisationName
fields.description: Not always set

types.name: MonthlyOpenProjectsCount
types.description: Count of open projects for a specific month

fields.name: setDatesOnProject
fields.description: Set or update the start and end dates for a project.

fields.name: setDatesOnArtworks
fields.description: Set or update the start and end dates for multiple artworks within a project.

fields.name: createUser
fields.description: Create a new user account within an organisation. Email invitation will be sent.

fields.name: createUsersFromEmailString
fields.description: Create multiple users from a list of email addresses. Sends invitations to all valid addresses.

fields.name: setOwnUserRealName
fields.description: Update the current user's first and last name.

fields.name: updateUserAccountInfo
fields.description: Update the current user's account information including address, phone, and work details.

fields.name: setUserRealName
fields.description: Admin only - Update another user's first and last name.

fields.name: setAvatar
fields.description: Upload and set an avatar image for the current user.

fields.name: deleteUsers
fields.description: Admin only - Delete users from an organisation. Removes access but preserves data.

fields.name: changeOwnPassword
fields.description: Change the current user's password. Requires providing the old password for verification.

fields.name: changeOwnEmail
fields.description: Request an email address change for the current user. Sends verification email to new address.

fields.name: changePassword
fields.description: Admin only - Change a user's password without requiring the old password.

fields.name: consentToGeneralTerms
fields.description: Accept the general terms and conditions for the current user.

fields.name: setPermissionGroupForUsers
fields.description: Admin only - Assign users to a permission group, controlling their access level and capabilities.

fields.name: setUserEmail
fields.description: Admin only - Change a user's email address directly without verification.

fields.name: setEarlyAccess
fields.description: Admin only - Grant or revoke early access program features for a user.

fields.name: setFtpPassword
fields.description: Admin only - Set FTP password for a user to enable file transfers.

fields.name: createFileDownloadJob
fields.description: Create a download job for a single file. Returns job ID for download from file service. Optionally package as zip.

fields.name: createDownloadJob
fields.description: Create a download job for multiple files with custom folder structure. Returns job ID for download from file service.

fields.name: reRenderFile
fields.description: Trigger re-rendering of a file (regenerates tiles, previews, and metadata).

fields.name: reRenderColorSeparation
fields.description: Trigger color separation re-rendering for a PDF file.

fields.name: deleteBarcode
fields.description: Delete a detected barcode from a file.

fields.name: modifyBarcode
fields.description: Modify the position or boundaries of a detected barcode on a file.

fields.name: createPrintSpecification
fields.description: Create a new print specification with default values. Returns the created specification's ID.

fields.name: requestUpdateForPrintSpecification
fields.description: Request an update form for a print specification, optionally sending it to a specific email address.

fields.name: updatePrintSpecification
fields.description: Update an existing print specification with new packaging, print, decor, or instruction details.

fields.name: deletePrintSpecification
fields.description: Delete a print specification.

fields.name: removeShares
fields.description: Delete one or more shares, removing access for recipients.

fields.name: markShareAsRead
fields.description: Mark a share as read by the current user.

fields.name: createShare
fields.description: Create a share and send it to specified email addresses. Recipients must have accounts to access.

fields.name: createAnonymousShare
fields.description: Create an anonymous share that can be accessed via a public link without requiring an account.

fields.name: markAllSharesAsRead
fields.description: Mark all shares received by the current user as read.

fields.name: createHubSpotContactIfMissing
fields.description: System admin only - Create a HubSpot contact for a user if they don't already exist in CRM.

fields.name: createHubSpotContactForAllUsers
fields.description: System admin only - Create HubSpot contacts for all users in the system.

fields.name: updateHubSpotContactToCustomer
fields.description: System admin only - Update a HubSpot contact's lifecycle stage to customer.

fields.name: updateAllHubSpotContactsToCustomer
fields.description: System admin only - Update all HubSpot contacts' lifecycle stage to customer.

fields.name: reindexShare
fields.description: System admin only - Reindex a share in the search system.

fields.name: updateOrganisationBaseInformation
fields.description: Admin only - Update organisation name and description.

fields.name: setOrganisationLogo
fields.description: Admin only - Set the organisation's logo image.

fields.name: createArtworkCategory
fields.description: Create a new artwork category for organizing artworks within the organisation.

fields.name: changeNameAndDescriptionOfCategory
fields.description: Update the name and description of an existing artwork category.

fields.name: setArtworkCategoryAsDefault
fields.description: Set an artwork category as the default for new artworks.

fields.name: archiveArtworkCategories
fields.description: Archive artwork categories (hide them but preserve existing usage).

fields.name: unArchiveArtworkCategories
fields.description: Restore archived artwork categories.

fields.name: deactivateOrganisations
fields.description: System admin only - Deactivate organisations, preventing access to the system.

fields.name: activateOrganisations
fields.description: System admin only - Reactivate previously deactivated organisations.

fields.name: startSubscriptionPaymentFlow
fields.description: Start the payment flow for a subscription. Returns a URL to Stripe checkout.

fields.name: cancelSubscription
fields.description: Cancel the current subscription. Access continues until period end.

fields.name: endTrial
fields.description: End trial period early and require subscription payment.

fields.name: changeSubscription
fields.description: Change to a different subscription plan. Prorates charges/credits.

fields.name: updatePaymentMethod
fields.description: Get a URL to Stripe portal for updating payment methods.

fields.name: setDesktopTheme
fields.description: Customize the desktop application theme colors and wallpaper for the organisation.

fields.name: createUserTeam
fields.description: Create a new user team for organizing users. Team ID will be generated if not provided.

fields.name: setUserTeamNameAndDescription
fields.description: Update the name and description of a user team.

fields.name: deleteUserTeam
fields.description: @deprecated. Use deleteUserTeams(teamIds: [UUID!]!)

fields.name: deleteUserTeams
fields.description: Delete one or more user teams.

fields.name: addUsersToTeam
fields.description: Add users to a team with optional admin privileges.

fields.name: removeUsersFromTeam
fields.description: Remove users from a team.

fields.name: setUserAsTeamAdmin
fields.description: Grant or revoke team admin privileges for a user.

fields.name: changeUserTeamApprovalMode
fields.description: Change the approval mode for a team (ALL_REQUIRED or ANY_MEMBER).

fields.name: addApiKey
fields.description: Add an API key for programmatic access to the system with specified scopes.

fields.name: removeApiKey
fields.description: Remove an API key, revoking its access.

fields.name: createEnterpriseSubscription
fields.description: System admin only - Create an enterprise subscription without payment flow for manual billing.

fields.name: createWebhook
fields.description: Create a webhook to receive event notifications at a specified URL.

fields.name: updateWebhook
fields.description: Update an existing webhook configuration.

fields.name: removeWebhook
fields.description: Remove a webhook, stopping event notifications.

fields.name: setCommunicationSettings
fields.description: Update communication settings for the organisation, such as default email notification preferences.

fields.name: createFolder
fields.description: Create a new subfolder within an existing mediacenter folder.

fields.name: createRootFolder
fields.description: Create a new root-level folder in the mediacenter. Requires special permissions.

fields.name: renameFolder
fields.description: Rename a mediacenter folder.

fields.name: moveFolder
fields.description: Move a mediacenter folder to a new parent location. Can specify position relative to target.

fields.name: copyFolder
fields.description: Copy a mediacenter folder and all its contents to a new location.

fields.name: deleteFolder
fields.description: Delete a mediacenter folder and all its contents. Use with caution.

fields.name: addUserToFolder
fields.description: Grant a user access to a mediacenter folder with specific permissions (write, manage, share, download).

fields.name: changeFolderUserPermission
fields.description: Change the permissions for a user who already has access to a mediacenter folder.

fields.name: removeUserFromFolder
fields.description: Remove a user's access to a mediacenter folder.

fields.name: addArtworkToFolder
fields.description: Add a mediacenter artwork to a folder (creates a link/reference).

fields.name: addFileToFolder
fields.description: Add a file to a mediacenter folder.

fields.name: obsoleteFolderItem
fields.description: Mark a mediacenter item (artwork or file) as obsolete without deleting it.

fields.name: unObsoleteFolderItem
fields.description: Restore a mediacenter item from obsolete status.

fields.name: changeFolderItemName
fields.description: Rename a mediacenter item (artwork or file).

fields.name: moveFolderItems
fields.description: Move mediacenter items from one folder to another.

fields.name: copyFolderItems
fields.description: Copy mediacenter items to another folder.

fields.name: removeFolderItem
fields.description: Remove a mediacenter item from a folder (deletes the item).

fields.name: commentMediaCenterArtwork
fields.description: @deprecated(reason: "Use commentMediaCenterArtworks instead")

fields.name: commentMediaCenterArtworks
fields.description: Add comments with optional annotations to mediacenter artworks. Comments can include markers and attached files.

fields.name: inValidateMediaCenterArtworkComment
fields.description: Mark a comment on a mediacenter artwork as invalid/deleted.

fields.name: validateMediaCenterArtworkComment
fields.description: Restore a previously invalidated comment on a mediacenter artwork.

fields.name: convertFileIntoMediaCenterArtwork
fields.description: Convert a file in the mediacenter into a mediacenter artwork with typed files (source, delivery, resource).

fields.name: setMCArtworkFiles
fields.description: Set/replace all files on a mediacenter artwork with typed files (source, delivery, preview, resource).

fields.name: snapshotTree
fields.description: Create a snapshot of the mediacenter folder tree for backup/versioning purposes.

fields.name: rollbackTree
fields.description: Rollback mediacenter folder tree to a specific event, undoing all changes after that point. Use with caution.

fields.name: removeEventsFromTree
fields.description: Remove specific events from mediacenter folder tree history.

fields.name: setMediaCenterArtworksDraft
fields.description: Mark mediacenter artworks as draft (hidden from normal views) or published (visible).

fields.name: saveMCArtworkPrintCoverage
fields.description: Save print coverage analysis data for a mediacenter artwork, including print and color canvas information.

fields.name: addArticleToMCArtwork
fields.description: Link an article/product to a mediacenter artwork.

fields.name: removeArticleFromMCArtwork
fields.description: Unlink an article/product from a mediacenter artwork.

fields.name: changeMCArtworkCategory
fields.description: Change the category of a mediacenter artwork. Cannot be used on artworks synchronized from projects.

fields.name: createArtwork
fields.description: Create a new project artwork within an existing project.

fields.name: createArtworksFromFiles
fields.description: Create multiple project artworks from existing files. Each file becomes a separate artwork.

fields.name: createArtworksFromMediaCenterArtworks
fields.description: Create project artworks by copying from mediacenter artworks. Links the project artwork to the mediacenter artwork.

fields.name: createArtworksFromProjectArtworks
fields.description: Create new project artworks by copying from existing project artworks (within or across projects).

fields.name: createProject
fields.description: Create a new project. Can optionally attach files or mediacenter artworks during creation.

fields.name: deleteProjects
fields.description: Delete one or more projects. Use force=true to delete projects that are not in a deleteable state.

fields.name: launchProjects
fields.description: @deprecated - no need to launch when planned state is removed

fields.name: closeProjects
fields.description: Close one or more projects, marking them as completed. Use force=true to close projects not in closeable state.

fields.name: reopenProjects
fields.description: Reopen previously closed projects, allowing further work to be done.

fields.name: assignUsersToArtworks
fields.description: Assign multiple users to multiple project artworks with specific roles (approver, receiver, supplier) in a single operation.

fields.name: addUserToArtwork
fields.description: Add a user to a project artwork (legacy operation, prefer assignUsersToArtworks for batch operations).

fields.name: assignApproverToArtwork
fields.description: Assign a user as an approver to a project artwork. Approvers can approve or reject the artwork.

fields.name: assignReceiverToArtwork
fields.description: Assign a user as a receiver to a project artwork. Receivers are notified when the artwork is delivered.

fields.name: assignSupplierToArtwork
fields.description: Assign a user as a supplier to a project artwork. Suppliers are responsible for uploading revisions.

fields.name: removeApproverFromArtwork
fields.description: Remove a user's approver role from a project artwork.

fields.name: removeReceiverFromArtwork
fields.description: Remove a user's receiver role from a project artwork.

fields.name: removeSupplierFromArtwork
fields.description: Remove a user's supplier role from a project artwork.

fields.name: removeAllAssignmentsForUserFromArtwork
fields.description: Remove all role assignments (approver, receiver, supplier) for a user from a project artwork.

fields.name: attachTeamToArtwork
fields.description: Attach a team from the organisation to an artwork with specified assignments.

fields.name: removeTeamFromArtwork
fields.description: Remove a team from an artwork.

fields.name: addTeamAssignmentToArtwork
fields.description: Add an assignment type (APPROVER/RECEIVER/SUPPLIER) to a team on an artwork.

fields.name: removeTeamAssignmentFromArtwork
fields.description: Remove an assignment type from a team on an artwork.

fields.name: addUserToArtworkTeam
fields.description: Add a user to a team on an artwork.

fields.name: removeUserFromArtworkTeam
fields.description: Remove a user from a team on an artwork.

fields.name: changeArtworkTeamApprovalMode
fields.description: Change the approval mode for a team on an artwork.

fields.name: removeSubApprovalForUser
fields.description: Remove a sub-approver's approval from a project artwork, optionally providing a reason.

fields.name: deliverProject
fields.description: Mark a project as delivered to the client.

fields.name: changeBasicProjectData
fields.description: Edit basic project data like name, description, dates, and order number.

fields.name: changeOrderer
fields.description: Change the orderer (client) of a project. Requires appropriate permissions.

fields.name: setProjectManager
fields.description: Assign or change the project manager responsible for overseeing the project.

fields.name: approveArtwork
fields.description: Approve a project artwork. The approver must be assigned to the artwork and the artwork must be in an approvable state.

fields.name: rejectArtwork
fields.description: Reject a project artwork with an optional comment. Can optionally reset other users' approvals.

fields.name: addCorrection
fields.description: Add a correction (comment with annotations) to a project artwork. Can include markers and attached files.

fields.name: newRevisionFromFile
fields.description: Upload a new revision for a project artwork from an existing file. Optionally include a comment explaining changes.

fields.name: createBriefFromFile
fields.description: Attach a brief document (reference file) to a project artwork.

fields.name: invalidateCorrection
fields.description: Mark a correction as invalid/deleted. Invalid corrections are hidden from the approval workflow.

fields.name: validateCorrection
fields.description: Restore a previously invalidated correction, making it visible again.

fields.name: exportProjectToFile
fields.description: Export a project and all its artworks to a downloadable file. Returns the file ID for download.

fields.name: remindApprover
fields.description: Send a reminder email to an approver who hasn't yet approved or rejected a project artwork.

fields.name: changeArtworkName
fields.description: Change the name of a project artwork.

fields.name: approveArtworks
fields.description: Approve multiple project artworks at once. Current user must be assigned as approver to all artworks.

fields.name: rejectArtworks
fields.description: Reject multiple project artworks at once. Current user must be assigned as approver to all artworks.

fields.name: revokeArtworkApprovalOrRejection
fields.description: @deprecated. Remove this

fields.name: revokeArtworkApproval
fields.description: Revoke approval status from project artworks, allowing them to be worked on again. Requires appropriate permissions.

fields.name: revokeArtworkRejection
fields.description: Revoke rejection status from project artworks, allowing them to be resubmitted. Requires appropriate permissions.

fields.name: startArtworks
fields.description: Mark project artworks as started/in progress.

fields.name: bundleArtworks
fields.description: Bundle project artworks for delivery. Sets artwork files and transitions to bundled state.

fields.name: deliverArtworks
fields.description: Deliver project artworks to receivers. Optionally include a delivery message. Triggers notifications.

fields.name: revokeBundlingOfArtworks
fields.description: Revoke bundling status from project artworks, returning them to their previous state.

fields.name: cancelArtworks
fields.description: Cancel project artworks, marking them as canceled and removing them from active work.

fields.name: deleteArtworks
fields.description: Permanently delete project artworks from the project.

fields.name: revokeDeliveryOfArtworks
fields.description: Revoke delivery of project artworks, returning them to bundled state. Useful for fixing delivery mistakes.

fields.name: rejectAndChangeDeliveredArtworks
fields.description: Reject delivered project artworks and change their state. Requires special permissions.

fields.name: changeCategoryOfArtworks
fields.description: Change the category of multiple project artworks at once.

fields.name: removeAllAssignmentsFromArtworks
fields.description: Remove all user assignments (approvers, receivers, suppliers) from project artworks.

fields.name: addArtworkActions
fields.description: Add actions to multiple project artworks (e.g., deliver to mediacenter, create color proof).

fields.name: removeArtworkActions
fields.description: Remove actions from multiple project artworks.

fields.name: finishArtworkActions
fields.description: Mark actions as completed on multiple project artworks.

fields.name: resetArtworkActions
fields.description: Reset completed actions on multiple project artworks to incomplete state.

fields.name: updateProjectNotes
fields.description: Update or set the notes field on a project (internal notes visible to project team).

fields.name: setProjectArtworkFiles
fields.description: Set/replace all files on a project artwork with typed files (source, delivery, resource). Optionally set bundled state.

fields.name: addArtworkFiles
fields.description: Add additional files to a project artwork. Does not replace existing files. Optionally set bundled state.

fields.name: synchronizeArtworksWithMediaCenter
fields.description: Synchronize multiple project artworks with their linked mediacenter artworks, updating content and metadata.

fields.name: synchronizeArtworkWithMediaCenter
fields.description: @deprecated use synchronizeArtworksWithMediaCenter(artworkIds: [UUID!]!): Boolean!

fields.name: addFilesToProject
fields.description: Add reference or supporting files to a project (not tied to specific artworks).

fields.name: removeFilesFromProject
fields.description: Remove reference files from a project.

fields.name: replacePreviewFile
fields.description: Replace the preview/thumbnail file for a project artwork.

fields.name: rollBackProjectHistory
fields.description: Rollback project history to a specific event, undoing all events after that point. Use with caution.

fields.name: revertProjectEvents
fields.description: Revert specific project events by ID. More targeted than rollback.

fields.name: setInvoiceNumber
fields.description: Set or update the invoice number for a project artwork (for billing/accounting purposes).

fields.name: savePrintCoverage
fields.description: Save print coverage analysis data for a project artwork, including print and color canvas information.

fields.name: createCollaborationForArtworks
fields.description: Create external collaboration links for project artworks, allowing non-users to view/comment via email.

fields.name: removeCollaborationForArtworks
fields.description: Remove a collaboration link from a project artwork.

fields.name: addArtworkRule
fields.description: Add a validation rule to a project artwork (e.g., bleed requirements, color space).

fields.name: removeArtworkRule
fields.description: Remove a validation rule from a project artwork.

fields.name: changeArtworkRule
fields.description: Modify an existing validation rule on a project artwork.

fields.name: checkoutArtwork
fields.description: Check out a project artwork for editing (creates a work copy for desktop editing).

fields.name: checkinArtwork
fields.description: Check in a project artwork after editing, uploading the modified files.

fields.name: setProjectsSilent
fields.description: Set projects to silent mode (suppress email notifications) or unset silent mode.

fields.name: createArticle
fields.description: Create a new article. Returns the created article's ID.

fields.name: updateArticle
fields.description: @deprecated(reason: "Use updateArticles instead")

fields.name: updateArticles
fields.description: Update one or more articles with new information. Null values are not changed except brandId/marketId (null removes them).

fields.name: deleteArticle
fields.description: @deprecated(reason: "Use deleteArticles instead")

fields.name: deleteArticles
fields.description: Delete one or more articles.

fields.name: setArticleCategories
fields.description: Set categories for multiple articles at once, replacing all existing categories.

fields.name: setArticleMarket
fields.description: Set market for multiple articles at once. Null removes the market.

fields.name: setArticleBrand
fields.description: Set brand for multiple articles at once. Null removes the brand.

fields.name: createArticleCategory
fields.description: Create a new article category with optional parent for hierarchy.

fields.name: renameArticleCategory
fields.description: Rename an article category.

fields.name: deleteArticleCategory
fields.description: Delete an article category.

fields.name: moveArticleCategory
fields.description: Move an article category to a different parent in the hierarchy.

fields.name: createMarket
fields.description: Create a new market for geographical organization.

fields.name: updateMarket
fields.description: Update a market's name.

fields.name: createBrand
fields.description: Create a new brand. UUID will be generated if not supplied.

fields.name: updateBrand
fields.description: Update a brand's name.

fields.name: active
fields.description: Is this an active organisation? If not it cannot be interacted with.

fields.name: refOrderNo
fields.description: The Purchase Order number

fields.name: files
fields.description: not available over subscription

types.name: ProjectFilter
types.description: A filter to reduce the number of projects

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Searches in name, descriptions, filecontent and barcodes

enumValues.name: PLANNED
enumValues.description: deprecated, planned is being removed

fields.name: plannerProjects
fields.description: Get all projects with planning information including dates, completion percentage, and artwork details.

fields.name: findUsers
fields.description: Search for users within the current organisation by username. Returns partial matches.

fields.name: findUsersPage
fields.description: Search for users within the current organisation with pagination support.

fields.name: findUsersAndTeamsPage
fields.description: Search for both users and teams within the current organisation with pagination. Useful for assignment operations.

fields.name: findUsersInAnyOrganisation
fields.description: System admin only - Search for users across all organisations by username.

fields.name: getUser
fields.description: Get detailed information about a specific user by username.

fields.name: getPermissionGroups
fields.description: Admin only - Get all available permission groups for the current organisation.

fields.name: possibleTrophies
fields.description: Get all possible trophies/achievements that can be earned in the system.

fields.name: validateEmails
fields.description: Validate a list of email addresses for deliverability and check if they're already registered users.

fields.name: exportUserSearch
fields.description: Export user search results as a downloadable file. Returns a file ID.

fields.name: file
fields.description: Get file metadata and information by its ID.

fields.name: existsInArchive
fields.description: Check if a file exists in the archive storage.

fields.name: artworkZipStructure
fields.description: Get the file structure for a project artwork as it would appear in a downloaded zip file.

fields.name: mcArtworkZipStructure
fields.description: Get the file structure for a mediacenter artwork as it would appear in a downloaded zip file.

fields.name: shareZipStructure
fields.description: Get the file structure for a share as it would appear in a downloaded zip file.

fields.name: tempFileUploadUrl
fields.description: Get a temporary URL for uploading a file directly to storage.

fields.name: tempFileDownloadUrl
fields.description: Get a temporary URL for downloading a file directly from storage.

fields.name: tempUrlForVideo
fields.description: Get a temporary streaming URL for a video file.

fields.name: printSpecification
fields.description: Get a single print specification by its ID.

fields.name: printSpecifications
fields.description: Get all print specifications in the organisation.

fields.name: findShares
fields.description: Search for shares with optional filters. By default excludes read shares unless includeRead is true.

fields.name: share
fields.description: Get a single share by ID. Requires authentication and access to the share.

fields.name: anonymousShare
fields.description: Get a single anonymous share by ID. No authentication required, works with public share links.

fields.name: status
fields.description: System admin only - Get system status including renderer status, version info, and command/query statistics.

fields.name: hubSpotCompanies
fields.description: System admin only - Get all companies from HubSpot CRM.

fields.name: searchHubSpotContacts
fields.description: System admin only - Search for contacts in HubSpot CRM by email address.

fields.name: openAiImage
fields.description: Generate an image using OpenAI's DALL-E. Default size 1024x1024. Returns base64 encoded JSON.

fields.name: askForOneDrivePermission
fields.description: Get a URL to request OneDrive permissions for file integration.

fields.name: organisation
fields.description: Get organisation details by ID. If no ID provided, returns current user's organisation.

fields.name: organisations
fields.description: System admin only - Get all organisations in the system.

fields.name: organisationMediaCenterStorageStorage
fields.description: Admin only - Get mediacenter storage usage for a specific organisation with size in specified unit.

fields.name: mediaCenterStorageForAllOrganisations
fields.description: System admin only - Get mediacenter storage usage across all organisations.

fields.name: organisationAuditLogs
fields.description: Get login audit logs for the current organisation showing user access history.

fields.name: assistantQuery
fields.description: Query the AI assistant with a prompt. Returns a thread ID for retrieving responses.

fields.name: subscriptionProducts
fields.description: Get all available subscription products and pricing for purchasing/upgrading.

fields.name: webhookEventTypes
fields.description: Get all available webhook event types that can be subscribed to.

fields.name: tree
fields.description: Get all mediacenter folders for the current organisation as a flattened list. Reconstruct the tree structure using parent IDs.

fields.name: folder
fields.description: Get a single mediacenter folder by ID with its subfolders.

fields.name: itemsForFolder
fields.description: Search and retrieve mediacenter items (artworks and files) within a folder with optional filtering and pagination.

fields.name: itemsForOrganisation
fields.description: Search mediacenter items across the entire organisation with optional filtering and pagination.

fields.name: usersForFolder
fields.description: Get all users with access to a specific mediacenter folder and their permissions.

fields.name: mediaCenterArtwork
fields.description: Get a single mediacenter artwork by ID. Note: This retrieves a mediacenter artwork, not a project artwork.

fields.name: artworkLocationsForProjectArtwork
fields.description: Find all mediacenter locations where a project artwork is linked/stored.

fields.name: mediaCenterArtworkForProjectArtwork
fields.description: System admin only - Get the mediacenter artwork linked to a project artwork.

fields.name: mediaCenterTreeHistory
fields.description: Get the complete event history for a mediacenter folder tree.

fields.name: projects
fields.description: Search and filter projects with pagination. Returns projects visible to the current user.

fields.name: project
fields.description: Get a single project by its ID. Returns full project details including all artworks.

fields.name: artwork
fields.description: Get a single project artwork by its ID. Note: This retrieves a project artwork, not a mediacenter artwork.

fields.name: projectHistory
fields.description: Get the complete event history for a project, including all changes and actions performed.

fields.name: artworkHistory
fields.description: Get the complete event history for a project artwork, including revisions, comments, and state changes.

fields.name: artworksToApprove
fields.description: Get all project artworks awaiting approval by the current user.

fields.name: artworksToUpload
fields.description: Get all project artworks where the current user is assigned as a supplier and needs to upload a revision.

fields.name: openAIProjectSummary
fields.description: Generate an AI-powered project summary tailored to a specific audience (project manager, orderer, or graphics creator).

fields.name: artworkAIAnalysis
fields.description: Start an AI analysis of a project artwork. Returns a thread ID for retrieving the analysis results.

fields.name: projectHistorySummary
fields.description: Generate an AI summary of a project's history. Returns a thread ID for retrieving the summary.

fields.name: openProjectsCountByMonth
fields.description: Get the number of open projects per month for the past year. Useful for trend analysis and capacity planning.

fields.name: articles
fields.description: Search articles with optional filters on article number, name, GTIN, category, or brand. Returns paginated results.

fields.name: article
fields.description: Get a single article by its ID.

fields.name: articleCategories
fields.description: Get all article categories as a flattened list (includes hierarchy via lineage field).

fields.name: projectArtworksForArticle
fields.description: Get all project artworks linked to a specific article.

fields.name: mediaCenterArtworksForArticle
fields.description: Get all mediacenter artworks linked to a specific article.

fields.name: markets
fields.description: Get all available markets for organizing articles geographically.

fields.name: brands
fields.description: Get all available brands for organizing articles by brand.

fields.name: statistics
fields.description: Get comprehensive statistics and analytics for the organisation including approvals, storage, deliveries, and user metrics.

fields.name: comment
fields.description: Any comment made when creating this revision

fields.name: closed
fields.description: Is this a closed revision, eg. the latest?

fields.name: messageSent
fields.description: Has all messages been sent about this revision

fields.name: revisionEvents
fields.description: The list of corrs for the revisions

fields.name: file
fields.description: The preview file of the revision (or today the actual revision file as a pdf)

fields.name: id
fields.description: unique event id to trigger changes

fields.name: name
fields.description: The name of the user using FirstName LastName

fields.name: organisationMemberships
fields.description: Admin only for other users

fields.name: addedBy
fields.description: The user that added this user to the current organisation

fields.name: addedAt
fields.description: When the user was added to the current organisation

fields.name: approvalMode
fields.description: Approval mode for the team. Defaults to ALL_REQUIRED if not set.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The __Directive type represents a Directive that a server supports.

types.name: __DirectiveLocation
types.description: An enum describing valid locations where a directive can be placed

enumValues.name: QUERY
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on queries.

enumValues.name: MUTATION
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on mutations.

enumValues.name: SUBSCRIPTION
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on subscriptions.

enumValues.name: FIELD
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on fields.

enumValues.name: FRAGMENT_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on fragment definitions.

enumValues.name: FRAGMENT_SPREAD
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on fragment spreads.

enumValues.name: INLINE_FRAGMENT
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on inline fragments.

enumValues.name: VARIABLE_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on variable definitions.

enumValues.name: SCHEMA
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on a schema SDL definition.

enumValues.name: SCALAR
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on a scalar SDL definition.

enumValues.name: OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on an object SDL definition.

enumValues.name: FIELD_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on a field SDL definition.

enumValues.name: ARGUMENT_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on a field argument SDL definition.

enumValues.name: INTERFACE
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on an interface SDL definition.

enumValues.name: UNION
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on an union SDL definition.

enumValues.name: ENUM
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on an enum SDL definition.

enumValues.name: ENUM_VALUE
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on an enum value SDL definition.

enumValues.name: INPUT_OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on an input object SDL definition.

enumValues.name: INPUT_FIELD_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on an input object field SDL definition.

types.name: __Schema
types.description: A GraphQL Introspection defines the capabilities of a GraphQL server. It exposes all available types and directives on the server, the entry points for query, mutation, and subscription operations.

fields.name: types
fields.description: A list of all types supported by this server.

fields.name: queryType
fields.description: The type that query operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: mutationType
fields.description: If this server supports mutation, the type that mutation operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: directives
fields.description: 'A list of all directives supported by this server.

fields.name: subscriptionType
fields.description: 'If this server support subscription, the type that subscription operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: specifiedByUrl
fields.deprecationReason: This legacy name has been replaced by `specifiedByURL`

types.name: __TypeKind
types.description: An enum describing what kind of type a given __Type is

enumValues.name: SCALAR
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a scalar. 'specifiedByURL' is a valid field

enumValues.name: OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an object. `fields` and `interfaces` are valid fields.

enumValues.name: INTERFACE
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an interface. `fields` and `possibleTypes` are valid fields.

enumValues.name: UNION
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a union. `possibleTypes` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: ENUM
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an enum. `enumValues` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: INPUT_OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an input object. `inputFields` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: LIST
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a list. `ofType` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: NON_NULL
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a non-null. `ofType` is a valid field.

directives.name: include
directives.description: Directs the executor to include this field or fragment only when the `if` argument is true

directives.name: skip
directives.description: Directs the executor to skip this field or fragment when the `if` argument is true.

directives.name: deprecated
directives.description: Marks the field, argument, input field or enum value as deprecated

directives.name: specifiedBy
directives.description: Exposes a URL that specifies the behaviour of this scalar.

args.name: url
args.description: The URL that specifies the behaviour of this scalar.
